name: Snowtrooper Officer
Lore: 'Elite snowtrooper offers, like all Imperial Army officers, are well versed in Rebel tactics. They serve as infantry liaisons to AT-ATs.',
Text: 'Deploy only on Hoth, but may move elsewhere. Snowtroopers are deploy -1 to same site. Your troopers may move to same Hoth site as a ''react.''',
